frontMatter.title: The 2019 Stratechery Year in Review
frontMatter.summary: 2019 was a transition year for me personally, and by extension, Stratechery. The nadir was an Article I regret — The WeWork IPO — where, despite not believing in the company, I wrote the contrarian take...

prev.title: Mozilla Hacks’ 10 most-read posts of 2019
prev.summary: Mozilla Hacks covered plenty of interesting territory in 2019. Our most popular posts introduced experiments and special projects, and described the evolution of groundbreaking platform technologies like WebAssembly and WASI. ...
